The "Markdowns" folder contains markdowns for the introduction, methods, results, discussion and references. 
The "Scripts" folder contains the bash scripts called from within the results markdowns. 
The "sequencing_qc" folder contains the MultiQC results (summarizing the FastQC output).
The "mapping_rates" folder contains a summary of the mapping rates per dataset.
